scripts.dev:5th: npm run generate-types && node scripts/deployCommands.js 5th dev && npm run emoji:sync:5th && nodemon src/shards/index-5th.js
scripts.dev:20th: npm run generate-types && node scripts/deployCommands.js 20th dev && npm run emoji:sync:20th && nodemon src/shards/index-20th.js
scripts.dev:cod: npm run generate-types && node scripts/deployCommands.js cod dev && npm run emoji:sync:cod && nodemon src/shards/index-cod.js
scripts.dev:5th:global: npm run generate-types && node scripts/deployCommands.js 5th dev-global && npm run emoji:sync:5th && nodemon src/shards/index-5th.js
scripts.dev:20th:global: npm run generate-types && node scripts/deployCommands.js 20th dev-global && npm run emoji:sync:20th && nodemon src/shards/index-20th.js
scripts.dev:cod:global: npm run generate-types && node scripts/deployCommands.js cod dev-global && npm run emoji:sync:cod && nodemon src/shards/index-cod.js
scripts.deploy:cod: node scripts/deployCommands.js cod prod && node scripts/syncAppEmojis.js cod
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:commands:all && npm run emoji:sync:all
scripts.deploy:commands:all: node scripts/deployCommands.js 5th prod && node scripts/deployCommands.js 20th prod && node scripts/deployCommands.js cod prod
scripts.clear:all:dev: node scripts/deployCommands.js 5th clear-dev && node scripts/deployCommands.js 20th clear-dev && node scripts/deployCommands.js cod clear-dev
scripts.clear:all:global: node scripts/deployCommands.js 5th clear-global && node scripts/deployCommands.js 20th clear-global && node scripts/deployCommands.js cod clear-global
scripts.emoji:sync:all: node scripts/syncAppEmojis.js 5th && node scripts/syncAppEmojis.js 20th && node scripts/syncAppEmojis.js cod
